dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_OB_RGA_ID ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_OB_SKU ,OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_SCHEDULED_DATE ,OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION ,OD_PB_VENDOR_COMMENTS ,OD_PB_REASON_CODE ,OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN ,OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE ,OD_PB_ENGINEER_FINDINGS ,OD_PB_SAMPLE_DISPOSITION ,OD_PB_CAP_YN ,OD_OB_REF_CAPID ,OD_PB_ATTACHMENT ,OD_PB_COMMENTS FROM Q_OD_OB_RGA_V WHERE NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_INVESTIGATION_STATUS,NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCING_AGENT,NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND OD_SC_SCHEDULED_DATE = NVL(TO_DATE(:P_SAMPLE_PICKUP_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),OD_SC_SCHEDULED_DATE) AND NVL(OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION,'X') = NVL(:P_PICKUP_LOCATION,NVL(OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN,'X') = NVL(:P_DEFECT_CONFIRMED,NVL(OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SAMPLE_DISPOSITION,'X') = NVL(:P_DISPOSITION,NVL(OD_PB_SAMPLE_DISPOSITION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X') = NVL(:P_CAP,NVL(OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X')) ORDER BY od_ob_rga_id, od_ob_sku
